message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, given its value to you is estimated at $8,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  However,  $9,500 is quite a bit more than I had budgeted for this.  I'd be willing to pay $7,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of your offer, I am willing to consider a middle ground. I propose a price of $8,500 for the product. This still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while being mindful of your budget.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $8,000 even.  That's my absolute limit, otherwise I'll have to go with a different option.
